dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Twitter
dmca.body:
Mobineon, Jul-02 10:18 am (PDT):

Tell us about yourself: I am the copyright owner.
Your full name: [redacted]
Job title: Support Manager

Email address: [redacted]
Street address: [redacted]
City: Zaporozhye
State/Province: Zaporozhye
Postal code: 69041
Country: Ukraine
Phone number(optional): n/a
Fax number(optional): n/a

Description of original work: Apps for Symbian - ScreenLock FX & Smart Notes

Reported Twitter account: lagenda4046
Description of Infringement: Twitter account @lagenda4046 is engaged in illegal distribution of stolen software.
There are illegally posted links to many stolen apps, including ScreenLock FX & Smart Notes which is our property.
These are full versions, stolen from the store, their distribution in this way is illegal.
We ask you to remove this account in shortest terms to avoid litigation.
Type of infringing material: n/a
Type of infringing material: n/a
Type of infringing material: Tweets
Specific Tweets: http://twitter.com/#!/lagenda4046/status/86334643699318785

512(f) Acknowledgment: I understand that under 17 U.S.C. Â§ 512(f), I may be liable for any damages, including costs and attorneys' fees, if I knowingly materially misrepresent that reported material or activity is infringing.

Good Faith Belief: I have good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

Authority to Act: n/a

Signature: [redacted]
